snippet: Facebook’s decision to list its shares on Nasdaq is a coup for the exchange, which has been embroiled in a fierce battle with the New York Stock Exchange for the company.
abstract: Facebook’s decision to list its shares on Nasdaq is a coup for the exchange, which has been embroiled in a fierce battle with the New York Stock Exchange for the company.

headline.main: Facebook Is Said to Pick Nasdaq for I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Facebook Is Said to Pick Nasdaq for Its Stock Listing
